title: Document Intelligence: Analyze complex documents using Document Intelligence and Azure OpenAI
description: This workflow uses Forms Recognizer connector to covert complex documents into markdown and Azure Open AI connector to analyze the image content, and provides response to specific questions, based on that image.
prerequisites:
To use this template, you need to meet the following requirements: 
- Configure an Azure Open AI instance and an embedding model. For more information, see [Create a chat with your data logic app project](https://github.com/Azure/logicapps/tree/master/LogicApps-AI-RAG-Demo). 
 - [Create an Azure AI service or Document Intelligence resource](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2302318). You then use the keys and endpoint to create a connection.

parameters.name: OpenAIModel_#workflowname#
parameters.description: Provide the Azure OpenAI deployment model to use for chatting with your documents.
